name: Indy Adventure
description:
This is me tinkering with the Godot engine for a final project in my computer science course. I started with the idea to do something similar to the Super Nintendo Indiana Jones game and this is what I ended up with. Run, jump, slide and avoid zombies and fireballs while collecting artifacts. 

Move Left or Right: A or D key or the Left or Right Arrow Keys.

Jump: Space Bar

Slide: Left or Right Movement Key plus Down Arrow Key

Fire Arrow: W
